metadata.h1: Our Terms of Service (The House Rules!) 📜
metadata.description: Here are the house rules for using our site! 📜 By hanging out with us, you agree to these terms. Read on for the full scoop!
metadata.coreKeyword: Terms of Service Olive Garden Menu Guide

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent:
1. The House Rules 📜

Welcome to the Olive Garden Menu Guide! By using our awesome site, you're agreeing to our house rules. If you don't agree, no worries, but you won't be able to use the site. We've put a lot of love into this content, so it's protected by copyright.

Last updated: September 30, 2025

2. Playing Fair (Use License) ✨

You're welcome to browse and use our site for your personal, non-commercial foodie adventures. But, this is a license to enjoy, not to own. That means you can't:

  • Copy or modify our content.
  • Use our stuff for any commercial purpose.
  • Try to mess with the site's code.
  • Remove our copyright notices.
  • 'Mirror' our site on another server.

If these rules are broken, we'll have to ask you to leave the party. Please be cool!

3. The Real Talk (Disclaimer) 💯

All the info on our site is provided 'as is'. We do our absolute best to be accurate, but we can't make any official warranties. We're a fan site, not the official Olive Garden, so always double-check with your local restaurant for the most current info!

4. The Legal Stuff ⚖️

Any claim related to our site will be governed by the laws of our home base. Pretty standard stuff!
